document_data.name: Wormriddle
document_data.mainbody: '''Wormriddle''' was a [[night hag]] who lived in [[Undermountain]] in {{Yearlink|1492}}.{{Waterdeep-time}}
document_data.Activities:
Wormriddle had a workshop at the magical school at the [[Dweomercore]] level of Undermountain.

Wormriddle was also a teacher at Dweomercore. She was second in command of the school, stepping up as headmaster when necessary.
document_data.Personality: Wormriddle had a debilitating fear of [[cat]]s and other feline creatures.
document_data.Relationships: Wormriddle commanded a group of four [[flesh golem]]s. When in dangerous situations, she [[polymorph]]ed as a young [[halfling]] girl named Medley. She kept a collection of magical dolls that resembled each of the students at Dweomercore and contained a sample of each of their bodies, such as hair or other corporeal secretions. The dolls could be used to inflict pain or harm on the students.
